name: Manas Kaul
description: Software Engineer, Full Stack Development, DA-IICT'21

subsection.heading: XPO, Inc
description: 2+ years of front-end development expertise, focusing on web application design and maintenance.
Improved user experience for existing applications and migration of legacy systems to newer technology and standards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure on-time and on-budget project delivery.
Awarded XPO Super-Star and XPO Value-Champion.

subsection.heading: Locations Admin
description: Spearheaded migration of the legacy application to an Angular-based solution, overseeing the entire front-end code base.
Developed end-to-end features which involved back-end API development.
Guided and mentored a dedicated team to ensure best practices and coding standards.

subsection.heading: Equipment Licensing
description: Enhanced user experience for equipment licensing processes, improving customer efficiency.
Engaged in ongoing discussions with shareholders to ensure alignment between development efforts and evolving project objectives.
Led project ownership and played a pivotal role in developing and successfully deploying the project to production.

subsection.heading: Privacy Wind
description: Developed PrivacyWind Android application, a privacy-focused application designed to empower users with control over permissions for their installed applications.
Developed features like permission manager, app search, real-time app activity monitoring & logging system, and app comparison tools to provide users with a robust privacy control suite.
